result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Defendant Andres N Lopez Rodriguez not in court.  Attorney Steven C. Spear in court for Andres N Lopez Rodriguez.  Attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for State of Wisconsin. Court inquired if victim wished to be heard; no statement made. Assessment is done, has two sessions to complete. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for November 17, 2022 at 08:30 am.
EFFECTIVE DATE OF THIS ASSIGNMENT IS AUGUST 1, 2022.

Prosecuting attorney Vivien L. TenHaken in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Andres N Lopez Rodriguez not in court.  Attorney Steven C. Spear in court for Andres N Lopez Rodriguez. Court inquired if victim wished to be heard; no statement made. Victim(s) have been given notice of hearing. AODA to be done up front. Case to be reassigned. Dates to be set by email. STC in August. Minutes filed.

Defendant Andres N Lopez Rodriguez not in court.  Attorney Steven C. Spear in court for Andres N Lopez Rodriguez. Prosecuting attorney J J. Crawford in court for the State of Wisconsin. Authorization on file. Offer received. Trying to find Spanish AODA; asking for AODA. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for July 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Scheduling Order will be provided to Attys via e-filing by the Court

Defendant Andres N Lopez Rodriguez not in court.  Attorney Steven C. Spear in court for Andres N Lopez Rodriguez. Prosecuting attorney James T. Sempf in court for the State of Wisconsin. Reading of complaint waived. Not guilty plea entered and trial reserved. Minutes filed.
Status conference scheduled for June 9, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Andres N Lopez Rodriguez in court. Prosecuting attorney J J. Crawford in court for the State of Wisconsin. MFAC denied. Court inquired if victim wished to be heard; no statement made. Defendant placed under oath by the court. Minutes filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Signed bond filed with the court.
SPD Notice of Ineligibility

Defendant will not in any way contact or attempt to contact any victim(s) listed and will avoid their residence/place of employment or any place they are located and will avoid causing any other person, other than defendant's attorney, from doing so on defendant's behalf.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as through the mail, by telephone, by way of electronic device, in person, or through a third party.  VICTIM(S)/RESIDENCE(S): M.L.L. DOB 10-01-2002, A.R. DOB 10-17-1995. Defendant shall personally ensure that payments are made under any Order for Income Withholding if the Court appoints an attorney for the defendant.

Prosecuting attorney James T. Sempf appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin, Defendant Andres N Lopez Rodriguez appeared in court. Interpreter St John previously sworn. Attorney options form given to defendant, referred to SPD. Defendant given complaint; charges/penalties explained by the court. Reading of complaint waived. Minutes filed.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Andres N Lopez Rodriguez appeared, Andrew Herrmann appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant needs Spanish interpreter.   Minutes filed.  Initial appearance scheduled for February 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
